title: Matt, the Green Cat: Inspirational Step Reading Chapter Book for Kids
description: ***Matt, the Green Cat***  On a lovely sunny day, a cute ginger cat suddenly turns a New Color! Matt is walking down the street and tells his fascinating and breathtaking story...  • The book Teaches kids that Being Unusual has a lot of Advantages and that our Friends and Family are very important in our life  • It encourages Kindness and Empathy towards others  • Wonderful HD pictures Educate and Enhance children's Emotions while reading  • Perfect Gift for children of Preschool age and their parents as a First Step Reading Picture Chapter Book for Kids.  Get an Inspirational and Teaching book for your Toddler!  Enjoy and have fun!
author: Jenny  Mitchell
